string-array.name: pagerContents
string-array.item: Is the most populous city in the United States. the city is the center of the New York metropolitan area.
Skyscraper located on Fifth Avenue between West 33rd and 34th Streets in Midtown . It has a roof height of 1,250 feet.
Is a major commercial intersection and neighborhood in Manhattan, at the junction of Broadway and Seventh Avenue.
Is an urban park in middle-upper Manhattan, within New York City. Is the most visited urban park in the United States.
Is a commuter, rapid transit and former intercity railroad terminal at 42nd Street and Park Avenue in New York City.
